name: New Christmas Hidden Objects
description:
Christmas is near! Santa is working very hard to get everything ready!!!!!

Travel through a Christmas atmospheric land and find all scattered Christmas hidden objects from themes full of Hidden Objects.

Have fun with beautiful graphical themes for all the family members to enjoy.

You can understand Santa can't manage much on his own. You can help him out find the hidden objects so just you would see only video .

kids all over the world and make their Christmas celebration very joyful and enjoyed with our other games.

Play with free Christmas hidden objects game inside more than 12 themes and more than 300 hidden objects.so you can more enjoyed with this game. This game is for girls and boys, especially for kids.

If you You are really Enjoyed with this game than give me rate and shared other people. Or any Suggestion than you can also tell me.
